title: Let's Go Fighting
overview: Revenge and love, which will be the first?The mini-drama tells the story of Mu Li, the youngest daughter of the president of the Mu Group, who was recovering abroad because she was weak and sick since childhood. Later, because her sister Mu Liu accidentally got into a car accident and was in a coma, her identity was changed. Together with their fiance Mo Chen, they investigated the cause of their parents' death and the cause of their sister's car accident.Mo Chen, the vice president of the Mo family pretending to be disabled, was injured and injured his legs fifteen years ago when he was being chased abroad. After he was secretly cured, he pretended to have problems with his legs. At first, he was fascinated by Mu Li's love words, but soon realized that she was not Mu Liu and wondered if she had other goals?Based on the novel "Bai Yueguang from the richest family is very fierce and super daring."
